channel.title: Walk, Attack, Follow
channel.description: Ok, I can't find the tut where it says how to change "Attack", "Follow" and such. Could someone please help me out?

item.title: Walk, Attack, Follow
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

find

        outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
        outStream.writeByteC(4); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
        outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
        outStream.writeString("@red@Trade");
        outStream.endFrameVarSize();

		outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
		outStream.writeByteC(2);		// command slot
		outStream.writeByteA(0);		// 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
		outStream.writeString("@yel@Follow");
		outStream.endFrameVarSize();

			outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
			outStream.writeByteC(3);		// command slot (does it matter which one?)
			outStream.writeByteA(1);		// 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
			outStream.writeString("@mag@fight@blu@");
			outStream.endFrameVarSize();
			IsInWilderness = true;

if(playerRights == 0)
{		
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@blu@Stats");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
}
else if(playerRights > 0)
{		
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@gre@Kick");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
}

eg change

 outStream.writeString("@red@Trade");

to this to make it green

 outStream.writeString("@gre@Trade");

Read full topic

item.title: Walk, Attack, Follow
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

Just in case you dont know, use these to color them
@red@ (red)
@blu@ (blue)
@gre@ (green)
@whi@ (white)
@mag@ (magenta…im not sure if thats one but i think it is)
@cya@ (cyan)
and so on…You should be able to figure them out.

Read full topic
